pages.text: Skip to main content Offers FISH FRY FRIDAYS: Better than ever Our Fish Fry Fridays are now an even ! Every Friday, when you order our Fish & Chips, we‚Äôll throw in a soup or salad ‚Äì all for just $12.99* better deal free Learn More Metro Merch: The Gift That Keeps On Giving Give Metro Diner merch and the recipient gets 10% off their meal every time they wear it in-diner! Shop Now A WELCOME OFFER FROM METRO E-CLUB When you join our E-Club, not only will you be the first to know about specials and promotions, you‚Äôll also get exclusive access to offers and events‚Äîstarting with 50% off your next entr√©e!* SIGN UP NOW

[Page Title: FacebookInstagram] Skip to main content Augusta Make My Location We're open Menus Menus All Menus Download Menu Gluten-Free Menu Catering Menu Order Order Takeout / Delivery Catering We're currently closed Get on the list Waitlist Menus Order Augusta, Georgia, home to golf, culture, true Southern hospitality and the best breakfast served all day at Metro Diner, the award-winning comfort food restaurant. Follow Us Facebook Instagram {{ location.address }} {{ location.locality }}, {{ location.region }} {{ location.postcode }} {{ location.address_2 }} Directions +1 706-750-0520 {{ getLongDay(days.name) }} {{ getHoliday(days.holiday) }} {{ locationFormatHours(days.hours) }} At this location Online Ordering Delivery Catering Curbside Pickup Alcohol Sold Here Breakfast All Day Outdoor Dining Free Wifi Clarissa Torres Managing Partner Metro Diner Augusta, GA Where Classic Southern Charm Meets Classic Southern Diner Food If you‚Äôre hungry for savory, home-style comfort food in the Augusta, GA, area, look no further than Metro Diner! Wondering what to expect from this award-winning restaurant in downtown Augusta? This much is guaranteed: a warm welcome; a hearty plate of some of the you‚Äôve ever tasted. Our Augusta location stays true to our humble roots with must-try signature items like Fried Chicken & Waffles and our famous Iron City Meatloaf (as featured on Guy Fieri‚Äôs ). best comfort food Diners, Drive-ins and Dives Located on Washington Road, near I-20 (Carl Sanders Highway), Metro Diner Augusta is less than a mile from Augusta National Golf Club and minutes from Augusta University ‚Äì Summerville Campus, Augusta Mall and the Medical District. It‚Äôs the perfect place to grab a bite to eat on your way into beautiful downtown Augusta to for a show at James Brown Arena or after exploring the Augusta Riverwalk. And about that Southern hospitality? You‚Äôll find an extra helping here at Metro Diner, where regulars and newcomers alike are welcomed like special guests in our home. Know that a warm smile comes along with every glass of sweet tea, cup of strong coffee and delicious . breakfast, lunch and dinner Favorites, offers & more! Sign Up & Enjoy 50% Off When you join our E-Club, not only will you be the first to know about specials and promotions, you‚Äôll also get exclusive access to offers and events‚Äîstarting with 50% off your next entr√©e!* Sign Up Today Din(n)er Deals ‚Äì starting at $10.99 Pick from seven craveable entr√©e combos ‚Äî each comes with a choice of salad or soup and a drink. The only way to snag these deals is to dine with us after 3pm, so hurry in! Learn More This place is so awesome! Serves big portions and everyone who works there seems to luv their job‚ù§ Felicia D. Augusta, GA The chicken and waffles are to die for! Not literally, of course! Lol but it's always a little peace of heaven when eating the fresh waffles, fresh juicy fried chicken AND that strawberry butter goodness! üòçü§§ G. Gemini Augusta, GA First time at Metro and wait staff was extremely friendly and attentive. Restaurant was very clean and food was very good and quickly prepared. Nels B. Augusta, GA Awesome food! Love the ambiance! Great service! Reasonable prices for such big portions! Very nice dining experience! James J. Augusta, GA Join Our Team! We are more than just a Team of people working together, we are a Family ‚Äì and our Family is growing! Team Members enjoy access to insurance, paid vacations, meal benefits, and career growth. Apply Today Other Locations Aiken 1944 Whiskey RoadSuite 101Aiken, SC 29803 +1 803-792-7808 View Details Savannah - Pooler 200 Tanger Outlets BoulevardSuite 200Pooler, GA 31322 +1 912-228-5628 View Details Charleston - West Ashley 1808 Sam Rittenberg BoulevardSuite 1Charleston, SC 29407 +1 843-894-0202 View Details View All Locations Out and About in Augusta And the Best Brunch in Town Here on the banks of the Savannah River, Georgia‚Äôs second-oldest city is home to beautiful parks as well as unique shops, attractions and museums including the Augusta Museum of History ‚Äì check out popular exhibits featuring two Augusta originals, singer James Brown and the Masters Golf Tournament. And if you‚Äôre here in April, you can experience the energy and excitement of the Masters Tournament for yourself, when golf fans from all over come to see the top golfers in the world! Just a few of the great places to visit in Augusta: Augusta National Golf Club Augusta Mall ‚Äì Riverwalk Augusta ‚Äì Morris Museum of Art Sacred Heart Cultural Center Meadow Garden James Brown Arena SRP Stadium Riverwatch Luxury Cinema Before or after you explore Augusta, may we suggest ? Come on by Washington Road for Fried Chicken & Waffles, Biscuits & Sausage Gravy, Avocado Toast, Classic Egg Benedict and more. Don‚Äôt forget the mimosas and Bloody Mary‚Äôs. Now we‚Äôre talking about a great day. Metro Diner Brunch Discover Atlanta‚Äôs Kid-Friendly Adventures And Metro Diner Family Meals to Go For the little ones, don‚Äôt miss a trip to one or more of Augusta‚Äôs great parks! Try Phinizy Swamp Nature Park, Living History Park, Pendleton King Park, Brick Bond Park or many more green spaces rich with history and the great outdoors. A picnic always makes a day more fun, and you can order ! We offer home and office delivery or try our contactless pick up ‚Äì either way, its family-friendly dining made easy. Metro Diner for breakfast, lunch and dinner to-go features Chicken Tenders, a lil‚Äô short stack of Pancakes, Belgian Waffles dusted with powdered sugar or a mini portion of Chicken & Waffles. Scratch-made, kid approved. Or try our Metro Diner Family Dinners like the Bissell Platter for 4 with scrambled eggs, bacon, toast, hashbrowns or grits and pancakes, a Boneless Wing Pack with dipping sauce or even our Iron City Meatloaf for 4 with creamy mashed potatoes and green beans. The Metro Diner Kids‚Äô Menu While we‚Äôre talking food to go, don‚Äôt forget ! Corporate event catering, graduation catering, business lunches, family reunions, you name it, we‚Äôll bring over tasty homestyle cooking for everyone. Your team or guests won‚Äôt be disappointed by crispy Fish & Chips, triple layer Club Sandwiches or Charleston Shrimp & Grits for a crowd. Metro Diner caters About Metro Diner Serving the Best Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch and Dinner since 1992 Officially opened in 1992, our original Metro Diner location in Jacksonville, Florida, quickly became go-to local restaurant for comforting classics and reimagined favorites. the Over the years, we‚Äôve continued to share our southern hospitality, big, bold flavors and passion for integrity, familiarity, comfort and community by bringing in new partners across the country. Today, Metro Diner has in 12 states and has earned a number of for our mouthwatering, home-style comfort food cooking including: Best Breakfast, Best Diner and Best Burger. over 60 locations awards We welcome you to visit us and try our for yourself! award-winning food Learn more about Metro Diner Read More Open Modal First Name * Last Name * Your Home Location * Choose home location... Offer not valid with any other offers, promotions or discounts. terms and conditions Submit About Metro Diner Metro Diner‚Äôs story began in 1938 when the building that would become opened in Jacksonville, Florida. Officially branded in 1992, Metro Diner quickly became go-to local restaurant for comforting classics and reimagined favorites. the first location the With the help of Master Chef Mark Davoli and his family, Metro Diner continued to grow and even earned a spot on Guy Fieri‚Äôs . Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives Today, Metro Diner has in 12 states and has earned a number of for its savory, home-style comfort food cooking including: and over 60 locations awards Best Breakfast, Best Diner, Best Burger Learn More About Metro Diner E-Club FAQs What is the Metro Diner E-Club? The Metro Diner E-Club is a free program where Members receive email communications about Metro Diner specials and promotions, get exclusive access to offers and events, and enjoy benefits like 50% off your first dine-in entr√©e and a birthday surprise! What is Metro Diner's Privacy Policy? Metro Diner will not sell or rent your personally identifiable information to anyone. View the full Metro Diner Privacy Policy What do I get for signing up for the E-Club? When you sign up for the E-Club, you will receive a code redeemable at any Metro Diner for 50% off your first entr√©e. This one-time-use offer can be redeemed in the Diner by showing the code to your server or used to . order to go online How long after I sign up should I receive my offer? . If you do not receive it after 2 hours, please check your spam/junk folders. Your offer will send to the email you used to sign up in about 2 hours Contact us if you have any issues and we‚Äôd be happy to resend! How do I update my E-Club info? If you would like to update your information, please contact us. Help! I did not get my E-Club sign up offer. Your 50% off entr√©e code is sent approximately 2 hours after sign up. If you still do not receive your email, please search ‚ÄúMetro Diner‚Äù in your inbox and check your spam/junk email folder. if you do not find it. Join us here at Metro Diner in West Ashley, for a warm welcome, the best breakfast, and award-winning Southern comfort food sure to please. Follow Us Facebook Instagram {{ location.address }} {{ location.locality }}, {{ location.region }} {{ location.postcode }} {{ location.address_2 }} Directions +1 843-894-0202 {{ getLongDay(days.name) }} {{ getHoliday(days.holiday) }} {{ locationFormatHours(days.hours) }} At this location Online Ordering Delivery Catering Curbside Pickup Alcohol Sold Here Breakfast All Day Outdoor Dining Free Wifi Doug Zink Managing Partner Metro Diner West Ashley-Charleston Breakfast All Day, Lunch to Go, Family Friendly Dinners & More! What to order at Metro Diner? When in Charleston, go with the Charleston Shrimp & Grits, of course! First, we make our grits good and cheesy then infuse ‚Äòem with roasted red peppers and andouille sausage. Next, we fry them to a golden crisp, top with tender shrimp simmered in a peppery sauce, and finish with crisp bacon crumbles. Mmmm. Located at the corner of Sam Rittenberg Blvd and Ashely River Road in the Westwood Plaza Shopping Center, Metro Diner West Ashley- Charleston is just a mile from the Cultural Arts Center of Charleston and near the College of Charleston and The Citadel. It‚Äôs also the perfect place for delicious before or after shopping at the Tanger Outlets, catching a Charleston RiverDogs or Battery‚Äôs game, or after visiting the Fort Sumter National Monument. breakfast, lunch or dinner Our regulars also go crazy for the Fried Chicken & Waffles with strawberry butter, made even more amazing with a drizzle of our house-made Spicy Syrup. There‚Äôs also Guy Fieri‚Äôs favorite from his visit: the griddle-seared, Iron City Meatloaf. Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives Favorites, offers & more! Sign Up & Enjoy 50% Off When you join our E-Club, not only will you be the first to know about specials and promotions, you‚Äôll also get exclusive access to offers and events‚Äîstarting with 50% off your next entr√©e!* Sign Up Today What Our Guests Are Saying Best restaurant in West Ashley! Mitch S. Charleston, SC Great food and lots of options! Chicken salad sandwich was huge and so delicious. Kids got chicken and waffles and those portions were impressive! Of course had to try it myself and was one of the best chicken breading I‚Äôve ever had! Gisela G. Charleston, SC The best biscuits and gravy. Great portions. Love the Metro Diner. Everyone is so nice and helpful and prices are great. Jane Charleston, SC Join Our Team! We are more than just a Team of people working together, we are a Family ‚Äì and our Family is growing! Team Members enjoy access to insurance, paid vacations, meal benefits, and career growth. Apply Today Other Locations Savannah - Pooler 200 Tanger Outlets BoulevardSuite 200Pooler, GA 31322 +1 912-228-5628 View Details Aiken 1944 Whiskey RoadSuite 101Aiken, SC 29803 +1 803-792-7808 View Details Augusta 2820 Washington RoadAugusta, GA 30909 +1 706-750-0520 View Details Fayetteville 2132 Skibo RoadFayetteville, NC 28314 +1 910-493-3560 View Details View All Locations Things to do in Charleston, SC Holy City Highlights with a Helping of Metro Diner‚Äôs Award-Winning Food Whether you‚Äôre in Charleston for business or pleasure, or you‚Äôre a native Charlestonian, showing visitors around, there‚Äôs much to see in a city that‚Äôs been voted ‚ÄúBest in the World‚Äù by . Travel + Leisure Charleston receives high marks for historic preservation and hospitality, so start by heading to historic downtown, or ‚ÄúDowntown Chuck,‚Äù where you can take it all in at your own pace. There‚Äôs no wrong way to see Charleston, but the Old South Historic Horse & Carriage Tour is a great option to see the city and snap some incredible photos. If you‚Äôre around in the spring, head to the stunning to catch the magnolias in bloom. Bring your family, or maybe a sweetheart, after all, andcall Charleston the most romantic city in the U.S. Middleton Place Gardens Travel + Leisure CNN A few more essential Charleston highlights: Arthur Ravenel Jr. Bridge Fort Sumter National Monument McLeod Plantation Historic Site Battery & White Point Gardens Nathaniel Russell House Old Exchange & Provost Dungeon Magnolia Plantation & Gardens Charleston City Market Charleston Harbor History Daytime Sunset Boat Cruise To keep your energy up and see all that Charleston has to offer, stop by Metro Diner in West Ashley to fill up on like Fish & Chips, Biscuits & Sausage Gravy, Belgian Waffles, a Classic Burger, or Bissel Breakfast ‚Äì any time of day! guest favorites Excursions for Kids and Kids-at-Heart And Family Meals to Go Family-friendly Charleston is also home to the and interactive Children‚Äôs Museum of the Lowcountry, great outlets for curious kids. Folly Beach County Park is gorgeous year ‚Äòround and the perfect spot to collect seashells and dip your toes in the Atlantic. South Carolina Aquarium Why not enjoy all this with a Metro Diner picnic? Our has kid-sized portions of our Fried Chicken & Waffles, as well as Chicken Tenders, Belgian Waffles, and plenty more to please even your pickiest l‚Äôil eaters. You can also order Metro Diner including Iron City Meat Loaf or Fried Chicken for Four, Boneless Wing Packs and more! Metro Diner Kids‚Äô Menu Family Meals to go In fact, we offer all our breakfast, lunch or dinner classics to go via , so order or pick up your grub at Metro Diner then head to the Joe Riley Waterfront Park for a picnic under a shady oak tree and a family photo by the famous Pineapple Fountain. So easy! pick-up or delivery If a party is more your style, for all kinds of events: business meetings, baby showers, graduation, corporate events, holiday parties, and even weddings! Here comes the bride‚Ä¶ and the Chicken & Waffles! Lovingly described as a ‚Äúlittle big town‚Äù by its residents, Fayetteville is a bustling city with a small-town personality and deep historical roots. There‚Äôs something for everyone in the . And for a blast from the past, there‚Äôs the Poe House or the sight where Babe Ruth scored his first professional home run. Cool Spring Downtown District Of course, if you‚Äôve just had one of our generous portions of Fried Chicken & Waffles or Biscuits & Gravy, a stroll down the gorgeous Cape Fear River trail is probably in order. Or a nap. üòâ Here‚Äôs a list of more local Fayetteville gems: ZipQuest Waterfall and Treetop Park Cape Fear Botanical Gardens Gillis Hill Farm David McCune International Art Gallery The Cape Fear Regional Theater Veterans Park The Shops at 123 Hay Street Museum of Cape Fear Lake Rim Park No matter what time of year you stop by, there‚Äôs always something to do! And no matter what time of day you visit Metro Diner, we‚Äôve got something for everyone: mimosas and Bloody Mary‚Äôs, Omelets, Fish & Chips, , Chicken Pot Pie and more! Dinner for lunch? Lunch for breakfast? Breakfast for dinner? Why the heck not?! Burgers Best for Family Dining Mouthwatering Menu for the Whole Family The little ones will love a trip to the , and they‚Äôll for sure work up an appetite. Check out the sure to win over even the pickiest eaters. Kids can choose from Chicken Tenders, a short stack of Pancakes, Belgian Waffles, or a kid-sized portion of Chicken & Waffles. Plus, with all the picnic-worthy spots in Fayetteville, order a Metro Diner and enjoy our mouthwatering comfort food wherever you choose! All American Community Opening Doors and Giving Back There‚Äôs a reason Fayetteville has won the National Civic League‚Äôs ‚ÄúAll American City‚Äù award three times. This is a community where nobody is a stranger and people look after one another. Metro Diner fits right in and is proud to serve many different charities, including the Kids Peace Organization. On Tuesdays, we open our doors an hour early to host a Breakfast Club, where locals pop in and enjoy Metro Diner hospitality over coffee and breakfast. We welcome you to join us! Apply Now Other Locations Charleston - West Ashley 1808 Sam Rittenberg BoulevardSuite 1Charleston, SC 29407 +1 843-894-0202 View Details Augusta 2820 Washington RoadAugusta, GA 30909 +1 706-750-0520 View Details Aiken 1944 Whiskey RoadSuite 101Aiken, SC 29803 +1 803-792-7808 View Details View All Locations Things to do in Savannah, the Hostess City With a Helping of Metro Diner‚Äôs Award-Winning Fare Savannah is exactly what you see when you imagine the South: prewar architecture painted in bright pastels and cobblestone streets lined with towering oak trees veiled in ghostly tendrils of Spanish Moss‚Ä¶ so, whatever you do, have the camera ready. All this beauty is best seen on foot, and with one of the largest National Historic Landmark Districts in the US, you‚Äôll want to take your time here. Start with a stroll through , or you can cruise around on the 60-Minute Guided Segway History Tour of Savannah. As the oldest city in Georgia, Savannah loves its history and its ghosts. For a little of both, take the 90-Minute Savannah History & Haunts Candlelit Walking Ghost Tour. The Savannah Historic District Once you‚Äôve gotten your bearings and seen a ghost or two, you‚Äôll be ready for more. Here are some of our favorites: Bonaventure Cemetery Cathedral of St. John the Baptist Historic River Street Congregation Mickve Israel American Prohibition Museum Wormsloe Historic Site Olde Pink House Historic Savannah Theatre With an itinerary like that, start or end your day by loading up on our delectable Chicken Pot Pie, Burgers, Chicken Tenders, Fish and Chips, or a crisp Chicken Tender Salad. Pro tip: it tends to get warm around here, so wash all that deliciousness down with ice-cold sweet tea or $3.39 mimosas. Cheers! Fun fact: Savannah is the first ‚Äúplanned‚Äù city in the United States, and it was specifically designed to provide citizens with gorgeous natural spaces to gather. So, why not make it a Metro Picnic? Simply any time of day. Then, head to the lovely Forsythe Park, find one of those shady oak trees we mentioned earlier, and dig into a picnic-perfect delights like our double decker Metro Club sandwich and Belgian Waffles. order breakfast, lunch, or dinner to go Fun Trips for Kids and Kids-at-Heart And a Family Restaurant for the Whole Crew Pooler is a quick car ride away from downtown Savannah with more incredible places to take the whole family. When you‚Äôre this close to the Atlantic Coast, a trip to the beach is in order and makes for the perfect day trip. Start at the Tybee Island Light Station & Museum and climb the 178 steps to the top of the lighthouse for some amazing views of the area. Then, if you‚Äôre not totally spent, rent some bikes and enjoy a ride on the beach and a dip in the Atlantic. Tybee Island Whew ‚Äì time to eat after all that! Three words: ! If your small fry doesn‚Äôt go for fish fry, they‚Äôll surely love something on our ‚Äì like the kid-sized Fried Chicken & Waffles topped with sweet strawberry butter and powdered sugar or ever-popular Macaroni & Cheese!
